reviews.text: Stayed overnight while making our way back to Auckland. Room had had air conditioning, tv, dvd player, small kitchenette, queen & single bed, small table & 2 chairs. Bathroom was a bit cramped but plenty of hot water & good water pressure. RSA club is just across the road for good food and a drink. Parking is in front of your unit.
reviews.title: Happy Stay

reviews.text: As we were doing the Forgotten Highway (Taumarunui via Whangamomona to Stratford) we decided to overnight in Taumarunui. We made no bookings but I found Twin Rivers on my I-fone although their web site interestingly enough isn't I-fone friendly and I couldn't see their street address anywhere! Thankfully Taumarunui isn't big so we found it OK. We were given a newly renovated Studio Unit and for $115 we thought it was excellent value for money, It was spacious enough for two people (particularly just for a one night stay) with full kitchen facilities and a small dining table and best of all, (very unusual for motels throughout NZ) it had a heat pump - thank heavens because it was exceedingly chilly. Well done Twin Rivers for having the heat pumps in your rooms. It was very clean and tidy and we parked right outside the unit.
reviews.title: Good value for money
